text: Velma Dinkley is a fictional character in the cartoon series Scooby-Doo. Velma first appeared in the show Scooby-Doo, Where Are You! in 1969. In it she was the smartest one. Nicole Jaffe played her. In 1976, Pat Stevens started to play Velma for The Scooby Doo Show. She was voiced by Mindy Cohn in 2002-2015. Kate Micucci played her since then. The TV show Velma is a Spin-off prequel about her. In it, Mindy Kaling plays Velma. ==Appearances== ===Television series=== * Scooby-Doo, Where Are You! * The New Scooby-Doo Movies * What's New, Scooby-Doo? * Scooby-Doo! Mystery Incorporated * Be Cool, Scooby-Doo! * Scooby-Doo and Guess Who? ===Films=== * Scooby-Doo (2002) -- (Main role) * Scooby-Doo 2: Monsters Unleashed (2004) -- (Main role) * Scoob! (2020) -- (Main role) Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1969 Category:Scooby- Doo characters Category:Animated human characters Category:Animated movie characters Category:Animated television characters
title: Velma Dinkley
